comments.body: Consider adding a `getAsString(String key)` here to cut down on the `getValue(key) as String` instances.

I considered something similar with a `T getValue<T>(String key) => _values[key] as T;` but the result is quite similar between `getValue(key) as String` and `getValue<String>(key)` (type parameter been mandatory in Flutter we can not  use `getValue(key)` and let inference get the expected type)
